sentences.sContent: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
sentences.sContent_eng: I define nothing. Not beauty, not patriotism. I take each thing as it is, without prior rules about what it should be.
sentences.sCn: 我不定义任何东西，不管是美，还是爱国。每件事在我眼里该是什么就是什么，没有什么优先规则使之应该成为什么。

phrases.pCn: 事先批准；预先审批；事前批准；事前许可；预先核准

remMethod.val: pri(=prim， 第一， 首要)+or→排在第一的→优先的， 在前的

words.tran: 优先；优先权；[数] 优先次序；优先考虑的事
把事情按优先顺序排好

trans.tranOther: existing or arranged before something else or before the present situation
